text: ۞ وَتَرَكۡنَا بَعۡضَهُمۡ يَوۡمَئِذٖ يَمُوجُ فِي بَعۡضٖۖ وَنُفِخَ فِي ٱلصُّورِ فَجَمَعۡنَٰهُمۡ جَمۡعٗا
translation: Nuko kuri uwo munsi (isezerano ryacu rizasohoreraho), tuzareka (Yaajuja na Maajuja) babyigane bamwe barwana n’abandi (banyuranamo ari uruvunganzoka), maze nihavuzwa impanda, tuzabakoranyirize hamwe bose.
